taskPromptPreview: Tell me about your favorite animal. Use 'it's' or 'it is' in your sentences. For example, 'It's cute!' or 'It is big!'
transcriptPreview: I really like Monkey. I like it because it is very cute and it is very fast. Once I've been in the zoo. And there was a monkey there. It was really fun.
